shaylan.shapes

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • shaylan.shapes.Shape
      • shaylan.shapes.Line

  • public class Line
extends Shape
    This class models a Processing-drawable Line
    Author:
    shaylandias

        y - The starting point y-coordinate
        length - The length of the Line
        angle - The angle of the Line
        strokeWeight - The thickness of the Line
        strokeColor - The Color of the Line

      • Line

            double y,
            double x2,
            double y2,
            double strokeWeight,
            java.awt.Color strokeColor)
        Creates a new instance of a Line object with one point at x,y and the other point at x2,y2
        Parameters:
        x - The first point's x-coordinate
        y - The first point's y-coordinate
        x2 - The second point's x-coordinate
        y2 - The second point's y-coordinate
        strokeWeight - The Processing strokeWeight when drawing this Shape
        strokeColor - The Processing strokeColor when drawing this Shape

      • getIntersection

        public java.awt.Point getIntersection(Line other)
        Returns a java.awt.Point representing the intersection between the Line and another Line. There may be a bug with parallel Lines where the Point is not correct.
        Parameters:
        other - The Line to compare to
        Returns:
        A java.awt.Point representing the intersection.
        Precondition:
        The input Line must not be null

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Line other)
        Compares two Lines to see if they intersect
        Parameters:
        other - The Line to compare to
        Returns:
        True if the Lines intersect
